author: kai zhu <kaizhu256@gmail.com>
description: lightweight standalone swagger-ui server backed by nedb
name: swagger-lite

scripts.build-doc: MODE_LINENO=0 utility2 shRun shReadmeExportFile package.json package.json && utility2 shRun shDocApiCreate "module.exports={exampleFileList:['README.md','test.js','index.js'],moduleDict:{'swagger-lite':{aliasList:['swgg'],exports:require('./index.js')},'swagger-lite.api':{aliasList:['api'],exports:require('./index.js').api}}}"
scripts.start: export PORT=${PORT:-8080} && export npm_config_mode_auto_restart=1 && utility2 shRun shIstanbulCover node test.js
scripts.test: export MODE_LINENO=0 && utility2 shRun shReadmeExportFile package.json package.json && export PORT=$(utility2 shServerPortRandom) && utility2 test node test.js
